document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Barricade </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">against </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Sky </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">martial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Trees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">withdraw </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Flag </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">turn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Armies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Russet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Halts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Nature's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">March </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indicate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cause </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">inference </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Mexico </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Effaces </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Surmise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Recurrent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">After </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Mind </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Massacre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Air </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Wound </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Wound </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Scar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Holidays </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">War </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Their barricade against the sky
